price: Isipo kuwa Iblisi. Yeye alikataa kuwa pamoja na walio sujudu.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: Lakini Iblisi alijivuna na akakataa kuwa pamoja na Malaika waliyo it'ii amri ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
